name: NWN EE official HD texture pack
author: Valerfor

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
It seems that after 3 years Beamdog updated the graphics engine of the game with a huge 4.1GB textures patch. Not everything has changed, of course, that would require a lot more work than that, but it's something, a beginning perhaps... The graphics update is simple to install, a simple extraction to the override folder is all it needs.  Take a look at a few screenshots I managed to gather from the net, the differences are subtle but there.








And here are the links to the sources & the vault of course.

https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/704450/view/3109168049657787421

https://neverwintervault.org/project/nwnee/hakpak/original-hakpak/beamdogs-hd-models-textures-pack-nwnee

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
It's utterly AWESOME!

Enjoying the hells out of it.

Unfortunately, there are no more plans from BD to expand on it - they said as much :(

Still, beggars can't be choosers, right?

I want moar!

posts.author: Ragar_Stormwynd
posts.content: I really like it! Unfortunately it's very.. buggy right now (at least for me it has been) I just hope that they iron that out relatively soon. All in all though I have zero complaints about the pack other than on the technical side of things.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
All in all this is an improvement. There is much better detail and texture.
I'm not too impressed with the head skins though. I think they look furrowed and wrinkled as if the characters suddenly were 20 years older.
